actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law

official_title: A bill to amend title 4 of the United States Code to restrict the authority of any State or political subdivision to impose any income tax on any compensation paid to any individual who is not a domiciliary or resident of such State or political subdivision.

summary.text: Prohibits a State or political subdivision from imposing an income tax on any individual who is not a resident or domiciliary of such State or political subdivision.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 4 of the United States Code to restrict the authority of any State or political subdivision to impose any income tax on any compensation paid to any individual who is not a domiciliary or resident of such State or political subdivision.
